channel.title: CPSC340 on jzhao.xyz
channel.description: Recent content in CPSC340 on jzhao.xyz

item.title: Linear Algebra
item.description: A lot of content summarized from Mark Schmidt’s notes on Linear Algebra Notation Generally column major Scalar (1,1): $\alpha$ Column Vector (m, 1): $\begin{bmatrix}a_1 \ a_2 \end{bmatrix}$ Row Vector (1, n): $\begin{bmatrix}a_1 & a_2\end{bmatrix}$ Matrix (m, n): $\begin{bmatrix}a_{1,1} & a_{2,1} \ a_{1,2} & a_{2,2}\end{bmatrix}$ Operations Transpose $(A^T){ij} = (A){ji}$

item.title: Machine Learning
item.description: Theory Course notes on CPSC340 with Andreas Lehrmann and Mark Schmidt We produce a lot of data (see: [[thoughts/Data Capitalism|data capitalism]])
